amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 118-142 to prohibit TRICARE from covering and the Department of Defense from furnishing sex reassignment surgeries and gender hormone treatments for transgender individuals.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits TRICARE from covering and the Department of Defense from furnishing sex reassignment surgeries and gender hormone treatments for transgender individuals.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rosendale amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 211 (Roll no. 301).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Rosendale.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rosendale amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 211 (Roll no. 301).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
